statements: SELECT * FROM ReturnsPrediction
SELECT id, return_date FROM ReturnsPrediction WHERE order_id = 123
SELECT return_volume FROM ReturnsPrediction WHERE return_volume > 50
SELECT id, return_date, return_volume FROM ReturnsPrediction WHERE id < 10
SELECT * FROM ReturnsPrediction ORDER BY return_date DESC
SELECT * FROM ReturnsPrediction WHERE return_volume > 100 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, return_volume FROM ReturnsPrediction WHERE return_volume BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY return_volume ASC, return_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, COUNT(id) AS return_count FROM ReturnsPrediction GROUP BY order_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT return_date FROM ReturnsPrediction ORDER BY return_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT order_id, AVG(return_volume) AS avg_return FROM ReturnsPrediction GROUP BY order_id HAVING AVG(return_volume) > 75;
SELECT * FROM historical_data;
SELECT id, return_date, return_volume FROM historical_data ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT location, return_volume FROM historical_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE fulfillment_status = 'pending';
SELECT resource_id, location, planned_date FROM resource_allocation ORDER BY planned_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE return_volume > 100 ORDER BY return_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT resource_id, location FROM resource_allocation WHERE fulfillment_status = 'pending';
SELECT location, SUM(allocated_volume) AS total_allocation FROM resource_allocation GROUP BY location HAVING total_allocation > 5000;
SELECT r.location, h.return_volume FROM historical_data h JOIN resource_allocation r ON h.location = r.location WHERE h.return_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY h.return_volume DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM historical_data UNION ALL SELECT * FROM resource_allocation ORDER BY return_date ASC, planned_date DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM Returns;
SELECT product_id, return_date, return_quantity FROM Returns WHERE return_quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT return_date, product_id, return_quantity, customer_id FROM Returns WHERE return_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, phone_number FROM Customers;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, category FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer, category FROM Products WHERE manufacturer='Apple';
SELECT return_id, return_date, product_id, return_quantity, customer_id FROM Returns WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM returns;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT return_id, return_date, return_quantity FROM returns WHERE return_quantity > 10;
SELECT prediction_date, predicted_quantity FROM predictions ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM returns WHERE return_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT return_id, return_date, product_id, return_quantity FROM returns WHERE return_quantity > 10 ORDER BY return_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM predictions JOIN returns ON predictions.return_id = returns.return_id WHERE predictions.predicted_quantity < 50;
SELECT * FROM return_volumes;
SELECT product_id, return_date FROM historical_data ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM predictive_models WHERE id = 3;
SELECT product_id, planned_quantity FROM planning WHERE planned_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_quantity < 50 ORDER BY allocated_date;
SELECT * FROM return_volumes ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_id, return_date, return_quantity FROM historical_data WHERE return_quantity > 100;
SELECT id, product_id, allocated_date, allocated_quantity FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocated_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_name FROM predictive_models WHERE model_description LIKE '%prediction%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM planning;
